Judul: STRATEGIC SUPPLY CHAIN OPTIMIZATION WITH COLLLABORATIVE PLANNING FORECASTING AND REPLENISHMENT AT NEXUS CORPORATION WITH 7WONDERS DISTRIBUTOR
Abstrak: Fast moving consumer goods is a very dynamic industry. In order to create process excellence, supply chain management held important roles for achieving objectives. This final project is intentionally to analyze NEXUS Corporation and 7Wonders Distributor, with the objectives of optimizing supply chain. NEXUS Corporation has intent to implement Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment in order to achieve the objective. Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment considered as an approach to optimize supply chain which involved NEXUS Corporation and 7Wonders Distributor. Key success within Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment is collaboration which expand into three phase; planning, forecasting, and replenishment. Issues within NEXUS Corporation to 7Wonders Distributor are unsupplied order in full quantity. This issue cause by three factors; inaccurate 7Wonders DistributorÃ‚Â’s sales forecast, inaccurate 7Wonders DistributorÃ‚Â’s order forecast, and higher order quantity from 7Wonders Distributor. Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment as an approach has basic fundamental to provide solutions for each issue. The succeed level from Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment depend on the available resources within the implementation of three phases in Collaborative Planning, Forecasting and Replenishment. Outcome from this project provide solutions in the form of the approach phase of planning, forecasting, and replenishment. Solutions resulting from this approach, of Collaborative Planning Forecasting and Replenishment are the implementation of collaborative sales and order forecast, utilizing adaptive sales forecast, resolving exception criteria for forecast adjustment, template development with SKU code alignment, and developing integrated portal system fir internal NEXUS Corporation. Within the implementation of each solution, NEXUS Corporation will do assessment, planning, execution and monitoring steps from each solution.
Kata Kunci: Collaboration, planning, forecasting, replenishment, order processing, and servicelevel, kolaboratif, perencanaan, peramalan, pengisian ulang, proses pemesanan, tingkat pelayanan
